nodes.text: Firebrand was the name of a hovertank deployed during the Battle of Denova. The Dread Masters took control of both Warstalkers led by Kephess and a significant number of Imperial force. Stormcaller and another tank named Stormcaller were piloted by two female pilots under the influence of the Dread Masters and engaged an operation group making its way to Kephess's Redoubt. In a fierce battle, both hovertanks were destroyed.
Firebrand appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a boss during the "Explosive Conflict" operation.
